committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: An act to exempt electric and telephone facilities assisted under the Rural Electrification Act from certain right-of-way rental payments under the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to provide that rights-of-way shall be granted, issued, or renewed without rental fees to electric or telephone facilities financed pursuant to the Rural Electrification Act of 1936. Provides that such amendment shall not be construed to affect the authority of the Secretary granting, issuing, or renewing the right-of-way to require reimbursement of administrative costs.

titles.title: A bill to exempt rural electric cooperatives from certain right-of-way rental payments under the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, and for other purposes.
An act to exempt electric and telephone facilities assisted under the Rural Electrification Act from certain right-of-way rental payments under the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976.
